name: Immunization
effects: Increase resistance to all status effects by 100% for all allies for 3 turns

desc_short: Boost poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance for all allies
提高全體隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的耐性
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승
Augmente la rés. à pois., céc., som., sil, para., conf., mala. et pétri pur tous les alliés
Erhöhte Resistenz gegen Gi., Bl., Schl., St., Lä., Konf., Vir., Stein, alle Verb.
Aumenta la res. a ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie de los aliados
desc_long: Boosts resistance to poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies.
提高全體隊員中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化的耐性。
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente la rés. à pois., céc., som., sil, para., conf., mala. et pétri pur tous les alliés
Erhöhte Resistenz gegen Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein bei allen Verb.
